::DrillBit::

He saw her spark flucuate. He began performing several operations
through the CR that should save her.

OOC: Since Yan told me that the Alliance base was on lock down and Hot
Rod couldn't have gotten out, lets say that after slipping that letter
under Feline's door, he went back to his room.
